CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 23, 1946, pg. 15, reads: "The Centre Avenue YMCA conducted Red Cross life saving and water safety instructors' course, under the direction of Emil Bonavita, right. Those who passed the test, [illegible] Mrs. Betty Fowler, James Fowler, Ben Franklin and Physical Director Pomeroyal C. Fountain receive cards. A course will be offered for persons interesting in passing the junior and senior Red Cross and YMCA  live-saving test, at the Centre Avenue YMCA beginning Tuesday, March 5. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Emil Bonavita handing out cards for passing life saving and water safety course to Pomeroyal Fountain, Ben Franklin, James Fowler, and Betty Fowler in Centre Avenue YMCA
